Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hi, I am trying to set up postback for Clickbank. I am having issue with testing the postback. Am I supposed to do a test conversion for myself? I am an affiliate so I don't have access to checkout page unless I buy the actual product

Hi Cole, I understand your concern. Yes, you will need to perform a test conversion to ensure the postback is set up correctly. You don't necessarily have to buy the product; you can use the test URL provided by ClickBank for this purpose. Here are the steps you need to follow:
1. Log in to your ClickBank account and go to 'Vendor Settings' > 'My Site'.
2. In the 'Advanced Tool' section, click 'Edit' and set the Secret Key and Instant Notification URL.
3. Switch over to your NewsBreak ad account and create/test your conversion flow in NewsBreak's Event Testing Tool.
4. Enter the test URL from ClickBank in the Test URL field on NewsBreak and click 'Go test' to trigger your conversion event.
5. Check back on NewsBreak's page for the test result.
For detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need any further assistance!
where do i get the secret key and instant notification url

You can find the Secret Key and Instant Notification URL in your ClickBank account. Here’s how you can get them:
1. Log in to your ClickBank account.
2. Go to 'Vendor Settings' > 'My Site'.
3. In the 'Advanced Tools' section, click on 'Edit'.
4. Set the Secret Key to: MONETIZENEWS
5. Set the Instant Notification URL to: https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/clickbank
6. Make sure you click 'TEST IPN' twice for verification and save the changes.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need any further help!

I'm sorry to hear that you're encountering an 'invalid IPN' error. Here are a few things you can check to resolve this issue:
1. **Secret Key**: Ensure that the Secret Key is set exactly to 'MONETIZENEWS'. Any typo or extra space can cause issues.
2. **Instant Notification URL**: Double-check that the Instant Notification URL is set to 'https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/clickbank'. Make sure there are no typos or extra spaces.
3. **Test IPN**: Make sure you click 'TEST IPN' twice for verification and save the changes.
4. **Permissions**: Ensure that you have requested access to the Instant Notification URL by checking 'Yes' for everything and saving the changes.
If you've verified all these steps and are still encountering issues, it might be helpful to refer back to the detailed instructions in this article: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak).
Let me know if you need any further assistance!
Philip Pirrip is talking to you.

Hi Cole - Please check our help center article for a new method to integrate with Clickbank - https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak

The last step says: 6. Go ahead and test the integration, this time in place of the {extclid}, please use the click id generated from the NewsBreak UI in Event Management and hit ‘Test.’
